content: पर्युपास् {c2c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To attend upon, worship, attend respectfully; पर्युपास्यंत लक्ष्या <ls>R. 10. 62</ls>; <ls>Ku. 2. 38</ls>; <ls>Ms. 7. 37.</ls> {@--2@} To go to (for protection), resort to, seek shelter or patronage with; अशक्ता एव सर्वत्र नरेद्रं पर्युपासते <ls>Pt. 1. 241.</ls> {@--3@} To enclose, surround. {@--4@} To share in partake of. {@--5@} To sit on. {@--6@} To live round.
